thread.section_title: doctorSIM Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of doctorSIM | doctorsim.com
thread.title: Seth McDermott

author: Seth McDermott
title: Seth McDermott
text:
I got my response with the unlocking code within 24 h (and I ordered it on the weekend). The code didn't work the first time (I made sure the code was typed in correctly), but I followed the instructions in the email, and it worked on the second try (same SIM, same code).
Also fyi, use a SIM that's still good (i.e. hasn't been deactivated yet) - it doesn't do anything if you try that. I also did that by accident by mixing up the cards, before the two tries I described above.
